channel.title: AMD TechTalk
channel.description: AMD TechTalk provides insight on data center to edge innovation that helps IT managers optimize today's deployments and tomorrow's infrastructure planning. Hosted by AMD's director of server competitive marketing, Jim Greene, and featuring leading technologists from AMD and the industry, AMD TechTalk features discussion on servers, cloud computing, AI, HPC and more.
channel.ns1:author: Jim Greene

item.title: Navigating IT Inflation, AI, and Virtualization Dynamics with Gina Rosenthal
item.ns1:title: Navigating IT Inflation, AI, and Virtualization Dynamics with Gina Rosenthal
item.description: Join host TechTalk host Jim Greene, Director, EPYC Product Marketing in a conversation with Gina Rosenthal, Principal at Digital Sunshine Solutions, as she discusses the ever-evolving IT landscape. With over 20 years of experience, Gina shares insights into managing the challenges of IT inflation, the adoption of new technologies like AI and virtualization, and how businesses are navigating the rapidly changing digital economy. Tune in as we explore the impact of automation, data center hygiene, and the role of infrastructure in supporting innovation.

item.title: Next-Gen Server Innovation for the SMB Market
item.ns1:title: Next-Gen Server Innovation for the SMB Market
item.description: Join TechTalk host Jim Greene, Director, EPYC Product Marketing, in conversation with Necole Lin, Product Marketing and Development Manager at ASRock Rack, as she discusses the company's role in the server industry and how its solutions are shaping the future of small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs). Necole explores trends in cloud, hybrid infrastructures, and AI adoption, as well as ASRock Rack’s innovative approach to energy-efficient, scalable, and affordable server solutions.

item.title: Empowering Developers with AMD AI Technologies in the Cloud: Jon Stevens, CEO of Hot Aisle
item.ns1:title: Empowering Developers with AMD AI Technologies in the Cloud: Jon Stevens, CEO of Hot Aisle
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene, Director, EPYC Product Marketing, chats with Jon Stevens, CEO of Hot Aisle about his journey from pioneering large-scale Ethereum mining to founding Hot Aisle, a company focused on democratizing enterprise compute power. Discover how Jon's vision is reshaping the data center space, his insights on AMD's role in AI innovation, and the future of scalable infrastructure

item.title: MWC 2025: How AMD Is Powering the Next Wave of Telco
item.ns1:title: MWC 2025: How AMD Is Powering the Next Wave of Telco
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Piotr Weglicki, Global Telco Lead in AMD’s Server Business Unit, about the biggest telecom trends at MWC 2025—from AI-driven infrastructure to energy-efficient compute.

item.title: Building Efficient Data Centers with Giga Computing
item.ns1:title: Building Efficient Data Centers with Giga Computing
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Carrie Wang, data center lead at Giga Computing, about the evolving demands of AI infrastructure, the future of data center cooling, and how Giga Computing and AMD are collaborating to drive data center computing innovation.

item.title: Understanding Tokenomics and the Future of AI with Unilever
item.ns1:title: Understanding Tokenomics and the Future of AI with Unilever
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Arun Nandi, Head of Data and Analytics at Unilever, about the rise of AI tokens, the impact of DeepSeek, and how tokenization is reshaping enterprise AI adoption.

item.title: Data Centers in Shipping Containers: Thinking Outside the Box with ElioVP
item.ns1:title: Data Centers in Shipping Containers: Thinking Outside the Box with ElioVP
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene sits down with Elio Van Puyvelde, founder and CEO of ElioVP, to discuss how deep hardware optimization can enhance AI performance, improve efficiency, and reduce power consumption. They discuss the evolution from GPU overclocking to AI workload tuning, the challenges of AI infrastructure, and the future of AI model efficiency.

item.title: Simplifying Enterprise Cloud with Platform9
item.ns1:title: Simplifying Enterprise Cloud with Platform9
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Madhura Maskasky, Co-Founder & VP of Product at Platform9, about the future of private cloud, seamless VMware migrations, and optimizing AI-ready infrastructure.

item.title: Driving ROI with AI: Unilever’s Data Intelligence Journey
item.ns1:title: Driving ROI with AI: Unilever’s Data Intelligence Journey
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Arun Nandi, Head of Data and Analytics at Unilever, about how AI and Gen AI are driving smarter decision-making, optimizing sustainability, and creating real business impact across Unilever’s global operations.

item.title: Exploring AI’s Role in Science and Energy with PNNL
item.ns1:title: Exploring AI’s Role in Science and Energy with PNNL
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Neeraj Kumar, Chief Data Scientist at PNNL, about how AI is accelerating discovery across scientific research, energy efficiency, and healthcare.

item.title: AI at Breakneck Speed: Insights from NeuReality
item.ns1:title: AI at Breakneck Speed: Insights from NeuReality
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Iddo Kadim, Field CTO at NeuReality, about the rapid evolution of AI, the future of enterprise deployment, and the infrastructure changes driving innovation.

item.title: Designing Chips for the AI Age with Synopsys
item.ns1:title: Designing Chips for the AI Age with Synopsys
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Todd Koelling, Senior Director of Product and Solutions Marketing at Synopsys about how AI is reshaping the semiconductor industry and how the partnership between AMD and Synopsys led to the fastest ramping product in AMD history.

item.title: Mastering AI Workloads with Metrum AI
item.ns1:title: Mastering AI Workloads with Metrum AI
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Steen Graham, founder of Metrum AI, to explore the evolving world of AI infrastructure, testing, and enterprise solutions.

item.title: Improving Video Security Across Industries with Aupera Tech
item.ns1:title: Improving Video Security Across Industries with Aupera Tech
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Mahdi Ghodsi, Director of Engineering at Aupera Technologies about how edge AI is transforming video processing across industries like retail, security, and smart cities.

item.title: The Future of Enterprise Storage with Infinidat
item.ns1:title: The Future of Enterprise Storage with Infinidat
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Eric Herzog, CMO of Infinidat about how it leverages cutting-edge technology to revolutionize enterprise storage, AI, and cybersecurity.

item.title: AI Infrastructure Revolution - Insights from Supermicro
item.ns1:title: AI Infrastructure Revolution - Insights from Supermicro
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Linda Yang, the Senior Solution Manager at Supermicro about the transformative impact of AI on computing infrastructure and the sustainable innovative solutions Supermicro is providing to meet these demands.

item.title: Leveraging RAG for Rapid AI Deployment
item.ns1:title: Leveraging RAG for Rapid AI Deployment
item.description: TechTalk Host Jim Greene chats with Meena Arunachalam, AMD's AI Systems Engineering Director and Fellow, about how RAG is paving a simpler path to AI adoption in the enterprise and delivering capability to ensure an enterprise-class reliability to AI solutions.

item.title: Unlocking Secure AI: Confidential Computing with BeeKeeperAI
item.ns1:title: Unlocking Secure AI: Confidential Computing with BeeKeeperAI
item.description: Tech Talk host Jim Greene chats with Alan Czeszynski, VP of Product at BeeKeeperAI, about how BeeKeeperAI's EscrowAI platform enables secure collaboration between algorithm developers and data stewards, preserving data privacy and intellectual property. Jim and Alan explore the technology, its applications across industries, and the future of AI and data security.

item.title: Delivering AI for the Enterprise with Lenovo
item.ns1:title: Delivering AI for the Enterprise with Lenovo
item.description: TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Robert Daigle, Director of Global AI Business at Lenovo about how AI is evolving in the enterprise, challenges organizations are currently facing to deploy AI solutions, gaps in sustainable infrastructure solutions, and how Lenovo is positioning itself to help customers deploy technology right sized for responsible delivery of AI at scale.

item.title: Tapping AI to Unleash Supply Chain Resiliency with Oii
item.ns1:title: Tapping AI to Unleash Supply Chain Resiliency with Oii
item.description: TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Oii co-founder and CEO, Bob Rogers, about how his organization is tapping AI to bring new levels of insight and control to supply chains, and how infrastructure optimization is critical to fully unleash the potential of Oii solutions.

item.title: An AI-Assisted Check-out Experience with RadiusAI
item.ns1:title: An AI-Assisted Check-out Experience with RadiusAI
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with the VP of Sales and Alliances at RadiusAI, Robert Hubbard, about how they're transforming the retail checkout game with AMD EPYC CPUs. With AI-assisted checkout, RadiusAI is lowering shrink and food waste, and increasing employee retention and customer satisfaction.

item.title: Delivering Mission Critical Database Performance with Oracle
item.ns1:title: Delivering Mission Critical Database Performance with Oracle
item.description: AMD TechTalk host talks with Oracle's VP of Mission-Critical Database Product Management, Ashish Ray, about how his organization is shaping the future of enterprise data management and how Oracle is tapping AMD EPYC processors to deliver the performance required by enterprise customers.

item.title: Delivering Cutting Edge Entertainment with Chaos
item.ns1:title: Delivering Cutting Edge Entertainment with Chaos
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Chaos' Director of Media and Entertainment and Strategic Products, Albena Ivanova about how her company is disrupting the world of media and entertainment with new software capabilities that tap AMD EPYC performance.

item.title: Strategic AI Integration: Balancing Visibility and Infrastructure with Geico
item.ns1:title: Strategic AI Integration: Balancing Visibility and Infrastructure with Geico
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Geico's Rebecca Weekly about how her organization tackles compute innovation to serve corporate requirements and customer needs and how AI's advancement represents new opportunity for IT innovation

item.title: Redefining Computational Efficiency with GigaIO's SuperNODE
item.ns1:title: Redefining Computational Efficiency with GigaIO's SuperNODE
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with GigaIO CEO Alan Benjamin about his company's unique take on delivering SUPERNODE, a scalable platform alternative that fast tracks company deployment of AI workloads.

item.title: Revolutionizing Public Safety at the Edge with IronYun
item.ns1:title: Revolutionizing Public Safety at the Edge with IronYun
item.description: TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with IronYun's Paul Sun about how his company is infusing AI into analytics solutions that yield breakthrough results for customers and how the IronYun team has worked with AMD to deliver improved performance and efficiency for customer deployments.

item.title: Transforming Media Delivery Through Encoding Innovation with Ateme
item.ns1:title: Transforming Media Delivery Through Encoding Innovation with Ateme
item.description: TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Ateme's Director of Technology and Standards, Jan Outters, about how the company is transforming media delivery with AI infused encoding innovation.

item.title: Combining AI, Data Science and Engineering Best Practices with Altair
item.ns1:title: Combining AI, Data Science and Engineering Best Practices with Altair
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Altair's Fatma Kocer-Poyraz about how her company is driving unique engineering solutions to market by tapping the confluence of AI and data science.

item.title: Delivering The Cutting Edge of Simulation with Ansys
item.ns1:title: Delivering The Cutting Edge of Simulation with Ansys
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with Ansys's Wim Slagter about how his company is tapping AI to improve simulation and comments on the deep collaboration between Ansys and AMD in driving the highest performance solutions to customers.

item.title: Delivering Advancement in Foundational Silicon Development with Cadence
item.ns1:title: Delivering Advancement in Foundational Silicon Development with Cadence
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene sits down with Cadence's Dan Lee to discuss the Spectre simulation suite and how the company is helping to advance silicon design with the help of AMD EPYC processor performance.

item.title: AMD EPYC Performance in the AI Era
item.ns1:title: AMD EPYC Performance in the AI Era
item.description: TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with AMD's Server Solutions Group CVP Ravishankar Kuppuswamy about changing computing requirements in the AI era and how AMD EPYC processors will deliver core capabilities to customers as they implement generative AI models.

item.title: Improved Multi-Physics Performance with Hexagon's Vicky Tsianika
item.ns1:title: Improved Multi-Physics Performance with Hexagon's Vicky Tsianika
item.description: AMD Tech Talk host Jim Greene chat's with Hexagon's Vicky Tsianika about the company's multi-physics and fluid dynamics solutions, how these markets are being re-shaped by AI, and how Hexagon has tapped AMD EPYC processors to fuel improved performance for their customers.

item.title: Security Requirements in the AI Era with Sally Eaves
item.ns1:title: Security Requirements in the AI Era with Sally Eaves
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with security expert Sally Eaves on the latest requirements for data center security in the AI era and how a hardware root of trust is becoming even more important for trusted environments.

item.title: An IT Perspective on Data Center Infrastructure Innovation with AMD's Ramki Balasubramanian
item.ns1:title: An IT Perspective on Data Center Infrastructure Innovation with AMD's Ramki Balasubramanian
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Jim Greene chats with IT veteran Ramki Balasubramanian about challenges facing IT professionals with today's workloads and how his organization approaches infrastructure modernization including use of AMD EPYC processors.

item.title: Charting Data Center Security and the impact of AI with Clarify 360's Jo Peterson
item.ns1:title: Charting Data Center Security and the impact of AI with Clarify 360's Jo Peterson
item.description: TechTalk host Jim Greene chat's with Clarify 360 analyst Jo Peterson on her view of the state of data center security, new opportunities and threats posed by AI, and how a hardware root of trust can help data center managers best protect their organizations.

item.title: Exploring Edge Innovation with AMD EPYC Processors with Cloudflare's Rebecca Weekly
item.ns1:title: Exploring Edge Innovation with AMD EPYC Processors with Cloudflare's Rebecca Weekly
item.description: AMD Tech Talk host Jim Greene chats with Cloudflare VP Rebecca Weekly about her organization's challenges in delivering to customer demands at the edge, where industry innovation is headed to deliver the performance required to fuel AI workloads, and how her company has tapped AMD EPYC processors to fuel innovation.

item.title: Improving data center performance and efficiency with Dassault Systèmes Charles Luzzato
item.ns1:title: Improving data center performance and efficiency with Dassault Systèmes Charles Luzzato
item.description: AMD Tech Talk host Jim Greene chats with Charles Luzzato, SIMULIA Industrial Equipment Industry Process Director, at Dassault Systèmes about how SIMULIA taps data to improve data center performance and efficiency, and how AMD EPYC processors deliver a performance foundation for SIMULIA deployments.

item.title: Optimizing Virtualized Environments in the 2023 Era with Jason Collier
item.ns1:title: Optimizing Virtualized Environments in the 2023 Era with Jason Collier
item.description: AMD Tech Talk host Dylan Larson sits down with tech guru Jason Collier to chat about the realities of managing virtualized environments and how AMD EPYC platforms can help IT managers drive innovation into the enterprise.

item.title: Making Room for Innovation with Lynn Comp
item.ns1:title: Making Room for Innovation with Lynn Comp
item.description: In this episode, TechTalk host Dylan Larson chats with Lynn Comp, AMD Vice President of Server Technology Marketing, about the unique opportunity new infrastructure represents in freeing IT resources for innovation.

item.title: The Era of Distributed Computing with TechArena's Allyson Klein
item.ns1:title: The Era of Distributed Computing with TechArena's Allyson Klein
item.description: TechTalk host sits down with the TechArena's Allyson Klein to discuss performance characteristics of multi-cloud environments and infrastructure evolution with the shift to distributed computing environments across cloud and edge.

item.title: The Cost of Doing Nothing with CTO Advisor Keith Townsend
item.ns1:title: The Cost of Doing Nothing with CTO Advisor Keith Townsend
item.description: AMD TechTalk host Dylan Larson chat's with CTO Advisor Keith Townsend on the hidden costs of IT inaction in modernizing data center infrastructure and what can be done to spur innovation.

item.title: Server Architecture Innovation with AMD Server System Architect Mahesh Wagh
item.ns1:title: Server Architecture Innovation with AMD Server System Architect Mahesh Wagh
item.description: In this episode AMD TechTalk host Dylan Larson chats with AMD's Server System Architect Mahesh Wagh about disruptive innovation coming to server platforms and how technologies like CXL will create new opportunity for memory capacity scaling and system design flexibility. Learn more at www.amd.com
